title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and choose 'Zip File' to export
4.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the export fails.
EB: The export should successfully include all files with the same name under different directories in the generated zip file.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Follow the steps provided in the description above.
2. Verify that the export fails and does not include all files with the same name in the zip file.
